mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK(NO, EMP_NO, IN_TIME) VALUES(SEQ_WORK.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NO, EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS IN_TIME, TO_CHAR(OUT_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_TIME FROM WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
SELECT SUM(TRUNC((OUT_TIME - IN_TIME) * 24 * 60)) AS MONTH_WORK FROM WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM')
SELECT SUM(TRUNC((OUT_TIME - IN_TIME) * 24 * 60)) AS WEEK_WORK FROM WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'iw') AND SYSDATE
SELECT TRUNC((SYSDATE - IN_TIME) * 24 * 60) AS DAY_WORK FROM WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
